text: Ana nganinyyimanya ya achakulungwakulungwa mu ŵanache ŵa Israila panyuma pa (kuwa) Musa, katema kaŵansalile Ntume jwao (jwali Samuyele) kuti: “Ntusagulile nchimwene kuti tupute ngondo petala lya Allah?” Jwalakwe ŵatite: “Mwinetu ŵanganyammwe ngaŵa nkuputa ngondojo pati jilamulidwe kukwenu.” Ŵanganyao ŵatite: “Chantiuli tukaputa ngondo petala lya Allah kutendaga tukoposyedwe mmajumba mwetu, ni ŵanache ŵetu (akamwilwe ni amagongo)?” Nambo ndema jakwalamulidwe kwa jamanjao kuputa ngondo ŵagalawiche ikaŵeje ŵannono mwa ŵanganyao, sano Allah ni jwaakwamanya chenene ŵakulitenda lupuso
